description: Protect your Amazon Kindle Fire HD 7 inch tablet with this CaseCrown Bold Trifold CaseStyleYou can think of the Bold Trifold as an upgrade from the Bold Standby. Although the design is a little different, all the essential qualities are the same. The sectional front cover design is the inspiration behind its name, Bold Trifold. This case shows off a simple and classy look that that appeals to students and professionals.FunctionThe all-around pocket and velcro flap help secure the tablet in place for a snug fit. The front cover is uniquely designed to transform into a comfortable viewing stand as well. Precise cut-outs and openings enable convenient full access to all Kindle Fire HD 7 features, including perforation for the dual-speakers. And most importantly, the built-in magnetic strip provides the sleep/wake feature.ProtectionThe durable synthetic leather exterior and soft suede-like interior build-up of the case provides great protection from damage and unwanted scratches so you can just grab your Kindle Fire HD 7 and be ready to go, knowing it will be protected at all times
